snippet.title: Ceress and Orea Trailer
snippet.description:
Hi everyone! This is the trailer for my game "Ceress and Orea". 

WISHLIST ON STEAM: http://store.steampowered.com/app/820900/Ceress_and_Orea/

Ceress is sentenced to death, because she's in love with the 'wrong' person. But stubborn as she is, she calls out to an old deity, demanding a chance to change this unrighteousness. 

Can Ceress overcome death to be reunited with the woman she loves? 

It's a short (approx. one hour) game were Ceress traverses through the death realm, which disguises itself as a cave system. 
It's an adventure and puzzler.
